abstract.t: Segment routing architecture (refer to [I-D.ietf-spring-segment-routing]) can be implemented over a MPLS data plane, an IPv4 data plane, as well as an IPv6 data plane. [I-D.filsfils-spring-srv6-network-programming] introduces the network programming concept in IPv6 data plane using segment routing technology, called SRv6, and it also defines some basic functions. The SRv6 functions can be advertised by routing protocols including OSPFv3, IS-IS and BGP-LS. This draft proposes some extensions to OSPFv3 ([RFC5340]) required to support SRv6.
